channel.title: Constant emote [562] Help!

item.title: Constant emote [562] Help!
item.dc:creator: @Galennn Galennn
item.description:
@Galennn wrote:

I would like to add a fun command that is commonly found in servers. Its ::godon and ::godoff. I am using 562 painzone base. (credits to painzone)
I would like to know that code for constant emote while walking and everything. Thanks for help in advance.

Would it look something like this?

if(cmd[0].equals("godon")) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851;(1500); player.sm("God mode activated");

Read full topic
